title: Jagged Alliance Flashback v1.0.1 Cracked-3DM
description:
Jagged Alliance Flashback v1.0.1 Cracked-3DM


v1.0.1

Bugfixes
Fixed & Uploaded Linux version
Tweaked Weapon sizes in-game
Fixed game crashing bug when dying from defending player controlled Sector
Fixed a bug that would hide the movement cursor & AP range feedback after displaying the weapon graphs
Fixed visual bug for defending Militia consisting of 15 Units
Fixed duplicate buttons on Rolodex
Fixed exception when exchanging items in quickslots
Fixed bug Unit not falling to prone when unconscious

Balancing
Slightly increased droprate from enemy Soldiers
Counter-Attack Squads and Patrol Squads take longer to spawn & re-spawn
Adjusted various weapon stats
Increased Militia Strength
